Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
